meta.description: Optimize the production of large and small pills to minimize filler usage.

sets.name: PILLS
sets.description: Types of pills produced in the lab.

params.name: ingredient_requirement
params.description: Units of medicinal ingredients required per pill type.

params.name: filler_requirement
params.description: Units of filler required per pill type.

params.name: total_ingredients
params.description: Total units of medicinal ingredients available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of pill to produce.

objective.name: min_total_filler
objective.description: Minimize the total number of filler material needed.

constraints.name: ingredient_constraint
constraints.description: Total medicinal ingredients used cannot exceed available supply.

constraints.name: min_large_pills
constraints.description: At least 100 large pills must be produced.

constraints.name: min_small_pills_ratio
constraints.description: At least 60% of the total pills must be small.
